validation.validation: Worker has no Position within this company. Tax Elections can only be created for Companies for which the Worker has a Position.
Non-Resident election cannot be selected for dates prior to 01/01/2018
Payroll Payee TD1 ID cannot be blank. Provide a valid ID or remove the Payroll Payee TD1 ID element.
You cannot change the Worker for an existing Payroll Payee TD1 Tax Election. Create a new Payroll Payee TD1 Tax Election or use the current worker for this election.
You cannot change the Effective As Of Date for an existing Payroll Payee TD1 Tax Election. Create a new Payroll Payee TD1 Tax Election or use the existing date for this election.
You cannot change the Company for an existing Payroll Payee TD1 Tax Election. Create a new Payroll Payee TD1 Tax Election or use the current company for this election.
The Basic Personal Amount entered does not fall within the permitted range for the tax year selected.
